$5.27 ‡∏´‡∏£‡∏∑‡∏≠‡∏ï‡πà‡∏≥‡∏Å‡∏ß‡πà‡∏≤

EN

MYX Finance has rallied 32% over the past six days, outperforming Bitcoin which crashed to near $65,000 levels. The token's price movement shows strong spot inflows with the Chaikin Money Flow indicator crossing into positive territory, signaling accumulation and strengthening investor participation. However, derivatives data presents a contrasting picture with negative funding rates indicating growing skepticism from futures traders about the sustainability of MYX's rally. Currently trading near $6.40 and holding above the $5.99 support level, MYX has immediate potential to reclaim $6.87 as support before advancing toward the $7.49 resistance zone. Despite outperforming the broader market, downside risks remain if sentiment shifts or if Bitcoin's sell-off continues, which could trigger a pullback to $5.27 or lower levels.

Key Points

  • MYX Finance rallied 32% while Bitcoin crashed to $65,000
  • Strong spot inflows contrast with negative funding rates signaling trader caution
  • MYX holding $5.99 support with upside potential toward $7.49 resistance
  • Downside risks remain if Bitcoin's sell-off continues

Article

MYX price rallies 32% despite Bitcoin crashing near $65,000 levels. Strong spot inflows contrast with negative funding rates signaling trader caution. Holding $5.99 support keeps upside toward $7.49 resistance intact. MYX Finance has defied broader market weakness with a sharp rally, gaining strong upside momentum over the past week. The surge reflects sustained investor confidence despite Bitcoin‚Äôs drop toward $65,000. While demand remains firm, emerging resistance levels suggest MYX‚Äôs upside may face near-term constraints if momentum weakens. MYX Investors‚Äô Inflows Counter Market Sell-Off Market indicators show MYX is benefiting from steady capital inflows. The Chaikin Money Flow, which tracks buying and selling pressure, has crossed above the zero line. This shift places MYX in the positive zone , a signal commonly associated with accumulation and strengthening investor participation. Sponsored Sponsored Positive CMF readings often support price recoveries during volatile periods. In MYX‚Äôs case, rising inflows suggest buyers are absorbing supply efficiently. This behavior reinforces bullish sentiment and supports price stability, even as broader crypto markets struggle to regain footing. Want more token insights like this? Sign up for Editor Harsh Notariya‚Äôs Daily Crypto Newsletter here . MYX CMF. Source: TradingView Despite strong spot demand, derivatives data signals caution. MYX‚Äôs funding rate has dropped sharply into negative territory. This move reflects the growing dominance of short positions over longs. Futures traders appear increasingly skeptical about the sustainability of MYX‚Äôs rally . The decline in funding rates occurred as prices continued to rise. Such divergence often suggests traders are positioning for a pullback rather than chasing upside. Elevated short interest can pressure price stability, especially if bullish momentum slows or broader market conditions deteriorate further. MYX Funding Rate. Source: Coinglass MYX Price Pushes Further MYX price has climbed 32% over the past six days and trades near $6.40 at the time of writing. The token remains above the $5.99 support, which has acted as a key demand zone. MYX has outperformed the broader market, with major assets posting losses. Sustaining this momentum depends on continued investor conviction. Ongoing inflows are necessary to offset derivatives-driven skepticism. The immediate objective for MYX is reclaiming $6.87 as support. Securing that level could allow the price to advance toward the $7.49 resistance zone. MYX Price Analysis. Source: TradingView Downside risks remain if sentiment shifts. A renewed Bitcoin sell-off could weigh on MYX , even if correlation stays limited. Failure to hold current support may trigger a gradual pullback. Such a move would erase part of the recent gains and invalidate the bullish thesis and fall through $5.99 to slide to $5.27 or lower.
